backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing leads in a map and exposing functions to add a lead and query one or all.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading fonts, meta tags, and mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component handling routing between the homepage and the Control Framework page.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing copyright info and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/forms/ControlLea: Lead‑generation form with validation, dropdowns, submission handling, and success state rendering.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section with email, phone, location, and a button to book a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/Control: Displays the CONTROL framework steps with images and descriptions plus a read‑more navigation handler.
frontend/src/components/sections/Emotion: Presents messaging about founder dependency and business fragility if the founder steps away.
frontend/src/components/sections/FinalCt: Shows a final call‑to‑action with text and a button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Provides the hero banner with headline text and buttons scrolling to contact or framework sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Industr: Lists target industries with icons and descriptions over a decorative background.
frontend/src/components/sections/Insight: Displays a grid of insight cards with titles, excerpts, and categories.
frontend/src/components/sections/Outcome: Shows key business outcomes and an accompanying dashboard image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Problem: Lists common business problems and highlights systems issues as the root cause.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Renders a four-step process section with visuals and styled cards describing Inovics’ workflow. Uses static step data and maps it into a responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIno: Displays three feature cards showing Control, Clarity, and Continuity with icons and descriptions. Introduces Inovics’ business operating system concept.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Navigation bar with scroll‑spy, hash‑based homepage navigation, and routing to the Control Framework page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on the user’s Internet Identity using React Query. Automatically refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and state management. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Submits lead data to the backend actor’s addLead method with loading, success, and error state handling. Depends on useActor for backend connectivity.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, INOVICS color variables, dark mode settings, and utility classes. Sets global visual rules including scrolling, borders, and reduced‑motion behavior.
frontend/src/lib/strategyCall.ts: Triggers a mailto link that opens an email prefilled for requesting a strategy call.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
Implements the CONTROL framework page with hero content, detailed framework steps, and a call‑to‑action button. Uses structured data to render each framework stage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom INOVICS colors, typography, animations, and container settings. Extends theme values and registers plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state for adding a CONTROL Framework landing page, navigation updates, and a lead‑gen form with required fields and behaviors.
